# cancelAllThumbnailImageRequests()

**Instance Method**

Cancels all pending asynchronous thumbnail image requests.

## Declaration

```swift
func cancelAllThumbnailImageRequests()
```

## Discussion

This method cancels only requests made using the [doc://com.apple.mediaplayer/documentation/MediaPlayer/MPMoviePlayerController/requestThumbnailImages(atTimes:timeOption:)] method. It does not cancel requests made synchronously using the [doc://com.apple.mediaplayer/documentation/MediaPlayer/MPMoviePlayerController/thumbnailImage(atTime:timeOption:)] method.

## Generating thumbnail images

- **thumbnailImage(atTime:timeOption:)**: Captures and returns a thumbnail image from the current movie.
- **requestThumbnailImages(atTimes:timeOption:)**: Captures one or more thumbnail images asynchronously from the current movie.
